comment: L'Amrique se tient avec la France.
amr:
# ::snt L'Amrique se tient avec la France.
(t / tient-of
      :ARG1 (c / city
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "L'Amrique"))
      :ARG3 (c2 / country
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "France")))

comment: NO FEAR!!! Let them fear us now.
amr:
# ::snt NO FEAR!!! Let them fear us now.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / fear-01
            :polarity -)
      :snt2 (l / let-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (f2 / fear-01
                  :ARG0 (t / they)
                  :ARG1 (w / we))
            :time (n / now)))
